text: Oh Nina enikholwayo! Qhelelanani kakhulu nomdlinzo ngempela eminye yemidlinzo iyisono futhi abanye benu bangabelusi abanye futhi bangabahlebi, ngakube oyedwa wenu uyakuthanda yini ukuthi adle inyama kamfowabo ofile? Ningayinyanya futhi yesabani uMvelinqangi, ngempela uMvelinqangi ungowamukela ukuzisola unesihawu
